description:
Using Grizzly G3.

After provisioning a baremetal with an image, bm_pxe_ips table is not getting populated. This table remains empty.
Only way to know which mac addresse got which ip address is by looking at /var/lib/misc/dnsmasq.leases
title: bm_pxe_ips table is not getting populated - Grizzly G3

comments.content:
Using Grizzly G3.

After provisioning a baremetal with an image, bm_pxe_ips table is not getting populated. This table remains empty.
Only way to know which mac addresse got which ip address is by looking at /var/lib/misc/dnsmasq.leases
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jay-s-b

comments.content: Jay, you should be able to get the Instance<->IP<->MAC mapping either from Nova network or from Quantum, via their regular APIs. The bm_pxe_ips table is not used and should be dropped; I am opening a separate bug to track that
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~devananda
